thread.section_title: Jesmond Dene Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best Bacon and Eggs
thread.title_full: The best Bacon and Eggs - Review of Jesmond Dene Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Haidee M
title: The best Bacon and Eggs
text:
I wanted to go online and comment on the brilliant English Breakfast we had on our stay at the Jesmond Dene. The hotel itself is located in a nice quiet square where there are many substandard hotels, but the really nice thing we liked was the English Breakfast.
the service was top class, freshly squeezed orange juice, which we helped our self too. Nice coffee, great eggs but the bacon was the best I have ever had. The room was a good size, very cozy and the shower room looked like it was recently refurbished.
I have already booked for our return trip next month as they had limited availability and didn't want to lose out. Very nice staff as well.
